document: ADSORPTION ON ACTIVATED CARBON OF METHANE, ETHANE, AND ETHYLENE GASES AND THEIR MIXTURES AND CARBON DIOXIDE AT 212 K, 260 K, AND 301 K AND UP TO THIRTY-FIVE ATMOSPHERES A THESIS Presented to The Faculty of the Division of Graduate Studies and Research By Ricardo Reich In Partial Fulfillment of the Requirements for the Degree Doctor of Philosophy in the School of Chemical Engineering Georgia Institute of Technology November, 1974 Reproduced with permission of the copyright owner.
